items.title: Saudi Arabia aims to expand its influence in the sports world with MMA venture
items.content_text: A league backed by Saudi Arabia — Professional Fighters League — is taking on the Ultimate Fighting Championship — or UFC — in the world of mixed martial arts.
items.content_html: A league backed by Saudi Arabia — Professional Fighters League — is taking on the Ultimate Fighting Championship — or UFC — in the world of mixed martial arts.

items.title: ‘Country club’ sports and ‘pay-to-play’ pipelines — does athletic recruitment favor certain Yale applicants?
items.content_text: A News survey and analysis of the backgrounds of Yale’s recruited athlete population found an overrepresentation of white and private-school students relative to the University’s overall population.
items.content_html: A News survey and analysis of the backgrounds of Yale’s recruited athlete population found an overrepresentation of white and private-school students relative to the University’s overall population.

items.title: OLYMPICS 'No plan B' for Paris opening ceremony after knife attack -sports minister
items.content_text: There is no "plan B" for the opening ceremony of the Paris 2024 Olympic Summer Games, the French sports minister said on Monday, after a man armed with a knife and hammer killed a German tourist and left two people wounded near the Eiffel Tower on Saturday.
items.content_html: There is no "plan B" for the opening ceremony of the Paris 2024 Olympic Summer Games, the French sports minister said on Monday, after a man armed with a knife and hammer killed a German tourist and left two people wounded near the Eiffel Tower on Saturday.

items.title: High school sports roundup for Dec. 3, 2023: Lincoln Park tops Moon in battle of No. 1 teams
items.content_text: Four players scored in double figures as Lincoln Park beat Moon, 63-53, in a battle of No. 1 teams Sunday night at the Midland Classic.

items.title: Babe Ruth rookie card sells for near-record $7.2M
items.content_text: A 1914 Baltimore News Babe Ruth rookie card sold for $7.2 million, including the buyer's premium, just after midnight Monday, the third highest sum ever paid for a sports card, and the most expensive Ruth item of all-time.
items.content_html: A 1914 Baltimore News Babe Ruth rookie card sold for $7.2 million, including the buyer's premium, just after midnight Monday, the third highest sum ever paid for a sports card, and the most expensive Ruth item of all-time.

items.title: Love Helps Packers to Thrilling Upset Victory Over Chiefs
items.content_text: Jordan Love threw three touchdown passes and Rudy Ford broke up Patrick Mahomes’ Hail Mary on the final play as the Green Bay Packers upset the Kansas City Chiefs 27-19.
items.content_html: Jordan Love threw three touchdown passes and Rudy Ford broke up Patrick Mahomes’ Hail Mary on the final play as the Green Bay Packers upset the Kansas City Chiefs 27-19.

items.title: Sports fans are paying big money for locker room access and other off-limits experiences
items.content_text: Barnabas Carrega, co-founder and CEO of GR8, says high-net-worth individuals are seeking the authenticity of behind-the-scenes experiences, which offer a "new angle" on sporting events.
